title.jp: The Sudden Pinch! the Terror of the Monstrous Zoamelgustar!

synopsis: Lina and Gourry hear of the famous "Zoanna's Evil Book" and go to the kingdom of Zoanna.

title.jp: The Roguish Priest! His Name Is Xellos!

synopsis: Lina and others continue their journey to help Zelgadis find "a copy of Claire Bible."

title.jp: A Wonderful Business! Being a Bodyguard Isn't Easy!

synopsis: Lina's party arrives at Atlas City. They get into an argument for a trifle and separate into Lina and Gourry, Amelia and Zelgadis groups.

title.jp: An Ancient Pledge! One Who Seeks Immortality!

synopsis: To collect the payment, Lina's party requests a meeting with Talim and Damia. They insist that they're not responsible for the beasts. Their guess is that the former director of their association, Harsheyfom, was behind this.

title.jp: Staying Behind for the Sake of Love!

synopsis: Lina and others run around the house, looking for the "Rock of Contract."

title.jp: You Can't Escape! The Return of the Obsessive Martina!

synopsis: After Atlas City, Lina's party gets back on the road. However, there's a shadow after them.

title.jp: Sudden Cooking! Follow the Phantom Dragon!

synopsis: Lina's party continues their journey to Sayloon kingdom. On their way, Lina sees the sign for the "legendary dragon food" and gets excited.

title.jp: Be Eternal! The Day Prince Phil Died?

synopsis: Lina's party gets to Sayloon kingdom. However, what waited for them was the funeral of Amelia's father, the first successor of the kingship of the country, Phil.

title.jp: Hidden Ambitions! the Shocking Confession?

synopsis: Lina's party finds out that the evils are after Sayloon kingdom, and go into the castle with Phil.

title.jp: On a Journey With a Pack of Scoundrels?! Take Back That Magic Power!

synopsis: Lina decides to visit a magic doctor who resides deep in the mountains in order to regain her magical power.

title.jp: Voices of Darkness! Slash 'Em to Bits, Ragna Blade!

synopsis: Lina can't regain her magical power and gets depressed. Then she notices a signal fire going up in Sayloon kingdom.

title.jp: The Unexpected End? the Shocking Truth!

synopsis: Lina's party gets depressed from having lost Phil to the evils.

title.jp: Impending Fall! the Moment of Ambition's Defeat!

synopsis: Lina's party beats Magenta, and are psyched up for beating Kanzel.

title.jp: The Forbidden Dance? Where Is the Strongest Spell?

synopsis: Lina's party learns about the presence of a high level monster an evil Dragon Lord called Garp behind the series of recent evil activity.

title.jp: A Big Crash? The Battle at Artemay Tower?

synopsis: Lina's party continues their journey to find the Claire Bible.

title.jp: Bitter Curve Balls! Gutsy Fast Balls!

synopsis: Lina's party gets to a town and gets the information that a copy of the Bible is on the trophy which is given to the winner of a magic tennis competition.

title.jp: They're Talking About a Girl Named Zelgadis?!

synopsis: Lina's party gets the information that a copy of the Bible is in the country where only women live.

title.jp: The Temple of Sand! the Secret of the Giga Slave!

synopsis: While Lina's party continues to look for a copy of the Bible, Zerros brings them the information that a perfect copy is at a castle nearby.

title.jp: Disclosure at Last?! Xellos' True Form!

synopsis: The evil Dragon Lord, Garp, presses Lina's party.

title.jp: No Other Choice! Set Course for Dragon Valley!

synopsis: After barely escaping from Garp, Lina's party heads to Dragon Valley in Catart mountain range to find a copy of Claire Bible.

title.jp: The Thousand Year Old Truth! The Traitorous Demon Dragon King!

synopsis: Lina's party gets away from the monsters and go into the cave where the Bible is supposed to be.

title.jp: The Stolen Sword of Light! The End of the Demon Dragon King!

synopsis: Garp puts Lina's party in a pinch. Then appears the most powerful evil Lord, Fiblizo, who came after the traitor Garp.

title.jp: The Menacing Swordsman! a Journey of Reunion!

synopsis: Lina's party gets depressed for having lost Gourry. Silfeel, who fought with them in Saylague, appears, learns of Gourry, and decides to fight with them.

title.jp: Sinister Trap! the Mysterious City of Ghosts!

synopsis: Lina's party gets to Saylague to rescue Gourry. Saylague was destroyed by the battle with clone Rezo, but now it's revived as the town of the dead by Fiblizo's magic.

title.jp: The Souls of the Dead! Lina's Final Decision!

synopsis: Lina's party faces Fiblizo, but none of their magic works on him.

title.jp: Go to NEXT! and Then Again...

synopsis: Giga Slave gets out of control, and the golden evil Lord, the Lord of Nightmares puts Lina unconscious.
